root.name: Trapped Dead
root.description: PlotThe game takes place in the small town of Hedge Hill, Missouri. The introduction of genetically modified corn to the town results in a virus spread by animal bites that turns everyone into zombies. Two college students, Mike and Gerald, find themselves thrust into the middle of this doomsday scenario when they stop for gas in idyllic Hedge Hill and must find a way to survive. Over the course of the game, players will run into 5 other playable survivors, all with different traits.GameplayThe game is played from a top-down, third-person isometric view. It features a cooperative mode that can be played both online and offline, as well as 7 different playable characters, all of whom have differing positive and negative traits that can benefit or hinder the player depending on the situation.
